snippet: A tendon injury has led the Chicago Marathon winner Moses Mosop to withdraw from Kenya’s Olympic marathon team. He will be replaced by Emmanuel Mutai, the 2011 London Marathon champion.
abstract: Moses Mosop withdraws from Kenya's Olympic marathon team because of tendon injury.
lead_paragraph: A tendon injury has led the Chicago Marathon winner Moses Mosop to withdraw from Kenya’s Olympic marathon team. He will be replaced by Emmanuel Mutai, the 2011 London Marathon champion.

headline.seo: Kenyan Runner Mosop to Skip Olympics Because of Injury
headline.main: Kenyan Runner Mosop to Skip Olympics Because of Injury
